game.title: A Noble's Quest
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family crest from the bandits in the forest
game.description: Lord Noble has had his prized family crest stolen by a group of bandits. You must find them and retrieve the crest for your reward.

task.objective: Speak to Lord Noble in his castle about the stolen crest
task.description: Lord Noble will give you information about where the bandits might be hiding out.

task.objective: Find and confront the bandit leader in the forest
task.description: The bandits are camped out in a clearing in the forest, north of the village. Once you've found their leader, defeat them to retrieve the family crest.
